description: Resources for individuals and organisations to download to support buying toys safely this Christmas.

details.body:
OPSS has produced safety guidance on how to buy toys safely this Christmas.

OPSS is keen for groups, businesses, and individuals to support and share the materials on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram by using the hashtag #SafeToys2021.

Toy Safety English Language A4 general leaflet

English Language A4 leaflet (PDF, 1.99 MB, 2 pages)
